title: Warmonger

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All references to Pacifist should refer to Pacifist (2486).
- Pacifist will always spawn. For all intents and purposes, you both count as one Town Power role combined.
- You cannot target Pacifist, and they cannot target you. Your abilities will fail if one is forced to target the other. (only the one who was controlled/redirected will fail, obviously)
- You know who the Pacifist is.
- If the Pacifist completes their subgoal before you, or you die and they survive, you lose.

- Destroying a player will attack them, and hide their will. Their role is still revealed.
- If you kill a good player, your ability will fail the next night.
- Conversion immune.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Hang every criminal and evildoer, while also killing two evil players.

desc:
